entities.name: fountain of magical brethren
entities.description: The Fountain of Magical Brethren is mentioned as the place where Dumbledore and Voldemort had a duel, and Harry was standing against the wall beside it. (Excerpt: 'the Fountain  of Magical Brethren — what hap- pened?')

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as a person who is discussing something with Fudge, and he is also the one who cast a spell to move the golden wizard's head. (Excerpt: 'We can discuss that after I have sent Harry back to Hogwarts,' said Dumbledore.)

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is mentioned as a person who is discussing something with Dumbledore, and he seems surprised to see Harry. (Excerpt: '“Harry — Harry Potter?” Fudge spun around and stared at Harry...')

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who was standing against the wall beside the fallen statue, and Dumbledore wants to send him back to Hogwarts. (Excerpt: '“We can discuss that after I have sent Harry back to Hogwarts,” said Dumbledore.')

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as a person who had a duel with Dumbledore, and the duel took place at the Fountain of Magical Brethren. (Excerpt: 'the Fountain  of Magical Brethren — what hap- pened?')

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who was standing against the wall beside the fallen statue, and Dumbledore wants to send him back to Hogwarts. (Excerpt: '“We can discuss that after I have sent Harry back to Hogwarts,” said Dumbledore.')

entities.name: golden wizard
entities.description: The golden wizard is mentioned as a person whose head was lying on the floor, and Dumbledore cast a spell to move it. (Excerpt: 'He walked away from the pool to the place where the golden wiz- ard’s head lay on the floor.')

entities.name: statue of witch
entities.description: The statue of the witch is mentioned as something that was lying scattered on the floor. (Excerpt: 'where the remains of the statues of  the witch, wizard, and centaur now lay scattered')

entities.name: statue of wizard
entities.description: The statue of the wizard is mentioned as something that was lying scattered on the floor. (Excerpt: 'where the remains of the statues of  the witch, wizard, and centaur now lay scattered')

entities.name: statue of centaur
entities.description: The statue of the centaur is mentioned as something that was lying scattered on the floor. (Excerpt: 'where the remains of the statues of  the witch, wizard, and centaur now lay scattered')

relationships.description: Dumbledore wants to send Harry back to Hogwarts. (Excerpt: '“We can discuss that after I have sent Harry back to Hogwarts,” said Dumbledore.')
Dumbledore and Fudge are discussing something. (Excerpt: 'We can discuss that after I have sent Harry back to Hogwarts,' said Dumbledore.)'
Dumbledore and Voldemort had a duel. (Excerpt: 'the Fountain  of Magical Brethren — what hap- pened?')
Dumbledore cast a spell to move the golden wizard's head. (Excerpt: 'He walked away from the pool to the place where the golden wiz- ard’s head lay on the floor.')
